com.sk89q.worldedit.regions

Interface RegionSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvexPolyhedralRegionSelector, ConvexPolyhedralRegionSelector, CuboidRegionSelector, CuboidRegionSelector, CylinderRegionSelector, CylinderRegionSelector, EllipsoidRegionSelector, EllipsoidRegionSelector, ExtendingCuboidRegionSelector, ExtendingCuboidRegionSelector, Polygonal2DRegionSelector, Polygonal2DRegionSelector, SphereRegionSelector, SphereRegionSelector

    public interface RegionSelector
    Region selectors create Regions from a series of "selected points." They are used, for example, to allow users to create a CuboidRegion by selecting two corners of the cuboid.
